i1.name: Divine Ascent
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon reaching levels 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending another skill point, '''Kayle''' ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.

{{sbc|Innate - Zealous:}} At level 1, '''Kayle's''' basic attacks [[on-attack]] grant {{sti|as|{{as|6% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, '''Kayle''' becomes {{as|Exalted|buzzword2}}, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|8% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
{{sbc|Innate - Arisen:}} At level 6, '''Kayle''' becomes a {{tip|ranged|ranged champion}} with {{sti|range|525 attack range}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Aflame:}} At level 11, while {{as|Exalted|buzzword2}}, '''Kayle's''' basic attacks [[on-attack]] against non-{{tip|turrets|structures}} additionally launch a wave of fire in the target's direction, dealing {{pp|type=[[File:Starfire Spellblade.png|20px|link=]] Starfire Spellblade's Rank|6|15;15 to 35|0 to 5}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies hit. The waves are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
{{sbc|Innate - Transcendent:}} At level 16, ''Zealous'' is permanently set to maximum stacks and '''Kayle''' gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' attack range}}, for a total of 575 attack range.
i1.notes:
* If '''Kayle''' is in her attack animation after the stacks finish she gains another {{fd|0.5}} seconds to refresh / stack ''Zealous''.
* Because '''Kayle''' is both a melee and ranged champion, she can buy both ranged and melee only items at anytime. However, melee only items will only work until she becomes ranged, while ranged only items will only work after. The same principle also works on range-dependent [[Runes_Reforged|Runes]]. Upon ''Arisen'':
** {{ri|Prototype: Omnistone}}: Cooldown between using keystones increased, from which with melee champions to that with ranged champions.
** {{ri|Conqueror}}: Stacks from basic attacks against enemy champions reduced, healing reduced, with same reason above.
** {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}: [[Named_item_effect#Wind.27s_Fury|WIND'S FURY]] enabled.
** {{ii|Tiamat}} and it's upgrades: both [[Named_item_effect#Cleave|Cleave]] passive and [[Named_item_effect#Crescent|Crescent]] active disabled.
** {{ii|Sterak's Gage}}: [[Named_item_effect#Lifeline|Lifeline]] disabled
*** However, [[Named_item_effect#Giant_Strength|Giant Strength]] and [[Named_item_effect#Sterak.27s_Fury|STERAK'S FURY]] are preserved.
* While in melee range after she becomes '''Arisen''', she will still attack with her sword, bypassing {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
** This will not negate the activation of ranged effects (i.e {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}).
** This will still not trigger the activation of melee effects (i.e {{ii|Ravenous Hydra}}).

q1.name: Radiant Blast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' plants a portal at her initial location that faces the target direction. After a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from the portal.

The sword explodes into a cross upon collision with an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|Slow|slowing}} targets struck, while reducing their {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by 15% for 4 seconds.
''Radiant Blast'' refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|50% of its mana cost}}}} for each enemy champion hit.
q1.notes:
* The VFX of the cross that spreads upon hitting its initial target shows the blade and guard of a sword.
** Despite the VFX suggesting otherwise, the two sides of the guard are each as long as the blade in terms of collision: approximately 295 units. {{pending for test}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)

  • Slow: %

w1.name: Celestial Blessing
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' and target allied champion are {{tip|heal|healed}} and gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.
If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, ''Celestial Blessing'' will automatically target the closest ally in range, prioritizing the most wounded one.
w1.notes: * The ability's effects apply instantly but '''Kayle''' will remain in {{ct|cast|cast time|move=true}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

e1.name: Starfire Spellblade
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. Additionally, {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame's}} base damage is increased.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle's''' next basic attack within 6 seconds deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. After unlocking {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame}}, the attack explodes, damaging and applying [[on-hit]] effects to all enemies around the target.
Prior to becoming {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, the empowered basic attack also gains {{sti|range|350 '''bonus''' range}}.
e1.notes:
* Before becoming {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, casting {{ai|Starfire Spellblade|Kayle}} won't make '''Kayle''' be a ranged champion (i.e. {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} will still be negated anyhow).
** When attacking below 175 range, the empowered basic attack is considered a {{tip|melee}} attack (i.e. it will trigger {{ii|Tiamat}}).
** Otherwise, however, such melee-limited effects will be negated despite '''Kayle''' itself being still a melee champion.

effects.str: • Passive Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)

r1.name: Divine Judgment
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' refreshes {{ai|Zealous|Kayle}} and grants the target allied champion or herself {{tip|invulnerability}} for a few seconds.

'''Kayle''' also begins {{ct|cast|conjuring|move=true|items=false,true|spells=true,true,false,false,false|interrupts=false}} swords around herself and highlights an area around her target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. At the end of the channel, the swords rain down and deal {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area around her target.
''Divine Judgment'' will prioritize casting on allies over '''Kayle'''.
r1.notes:
* The aura around the target does not appear if the target is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemies' point of view.
* The {{tip|mana}} expenditure only occurs after the cast time, though '''Kayle''' requires at least 100 mana to begin the cast. 
** The ability will still go off if '''Kayle''' has less than the required mana at the time of expenditure (for effects such as {{iis|Seraph's Embrace}}).
* Once cast has begun, the second part of the ability will go off regardless of whether or not '''Kayle''' or her target are alive.
* The prioritization will also cause ''Divine Judgement'' to be able to target allied [[decoy|decoys]], which are otherwise {{tip|untargetable}} by allies.
* The ending of other ''invulnerability'' effects (i.e {{cai|Lamb's Respite|Kindred}}) will cause ''Divine Judgement'''s invulnerability to shortly have no effect.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 80% AP)
